clustering module¶

clustering.analyze_centrality(G, amount=10)[source]¶

Analyze centrality measures of nodes in graph G. :param G: graph to analyze :type G: nx.Graph :param amount: number of top nodes to return :type amount: int

Returns:

dictionary where keys are centrality measures, values are lists of tuples (node, centrality value)

Return type:

results (dict)

clustering.analyze_clusters(clusters)[source]¶

Analyze clusters in statistical terms. :param clusters: dictionary where keys are method names, values are partition results. :type clusters: dict

Returns:

dictionary where keys are method names, values are dictionaries with mean, variance and standard deviation of community sizes.

Return type:

analysis (dict)

clustering.apply_clustering_algorithms(G)[source]¶

Apply clustering algorithms to provided graph G. :param G: graph to partition :type G: nx.Graph

Returns:

dictionary where keys are method names, values are partition results.

Return type:

clusters (dict)

clustering.calculate_density(G, community)[source]¶

Calculate density of given community in graph G. Density is defined as number of edges divided by number of all possible edges in a clique of the same size. :param G: graph containing community :type G: nx.Graph :param community: list of nodes in community :type community: list

Returns:

density of community as a subgraph of G

Return type:

density (float)

clustering.calculate_modularity(G, partition)[source]¶

Calculate modularity of given partition of graph G. :param G: partitioned graph :type G: nx.Graph :param partition: dictionary where keys are nodes, values are community assignments :type partition: dict

Returns:

modularity of given partition

Return type:

modularity (float)

Cluster-based social network analysis for review graph
